resource_section: Distribution by ports of arrival (percentage) â€“ 2020
remarks: Dataset contains tourist arrival statistics by port of entry for 2020, showing the number of arrivals at each port. Columns: Port and Arrivals. Data includes 5 ports with Katunayake (Bandaranaike International Airport) having the highest arrivals (818,975, 93.7%), followed by Colombo Harbour (26,816, 3.1%), Mattala Rajapaksa International Airport (14,406, 1.6%), Galle Harbour (13,416, 1.5%), and Trincomalee Harbour (404, 0.05%). Total arrivals across all ports amount to 874,017.
